Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
February 2023 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

Welcome to The Justia Insider! In this month’s edition, you will find important announcements, our most recent accomplishments, and details regarding what is happening behind the scenes at Justia. Time seems to be whizzing by, great things are happening, and we are eager to share all of the great news with everyone. February is filled with friendship and love, so don’t miss the chance to embrace the spirit with colleagues, friends, and family!

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

CLE Justia Webinar. We hosted our first CLE-eligible webinar this month. It is a result of our certification efforts, a new CLE Center in Justia Connect, and other updates to make it easy for lawyers to fulfill their education requirements with Justia. Of course, we focused all our marketing efforts on promoting the first CLE webinar through web banners and email marketing.

Justia Lawyer Directory Payments. We migrated our contracts and payment processing over to DocuSign and Stripe, respectively. This significant improvement will allow us to improve our clients’ experience and retention.

Goals Tracking. Our Data Team set up an interface to make it easy for company goal owners to track progress. Last month they also released the Justia Goals, Justia Ask A Lawyer, and the Justia Daily Opinion Summaries newsletters automated dashboards. These efforts are crucial to keeping an eye out for the goals.

RDS Generational Upgrades. We performed server maintenance for several of our database servers from a wide range of Justia properties to comply with AWS requirements this month. This is in addition to the usual monthly maintenance.

Server OS Upgrade. We upgraded our base server template to run on the latest major version of the Ubuntu operating system. We also successfully upgraded the first server to this upgraded image.

Automation QA. We actively continue working on improved support for automated QA for Justia Elevate. Also, we added support for Apache Tika, a tool that helps us process and QA PDF files, to continue ensuring the quality of our free law database resources.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • Additional Snippets. We have improved the accessibility and clarity of our Intellectual Property, Education Law, and Lawyers and the Legal Process centers by writing more snippets highlighting critical points in these areas.
  • New Video Project. We have started writing scripts for videos on some of the major practice areas, such as family law, criminal law, and personal injury. These will help bring the content of our Justia Legal Guides to life.
  • Child Safety Center Is Live! Check out our newest Justia Legal Guide on what parents can do to protect their children and legal claims when children are injured.

NEW TEAM MEMBERS

Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

Irvin Garcia

SEO Intern

Hi! My name is Irvin García. I'm 20 years old, and I am from Saltillo, Coahuila. I'm currently studying Computer Systems Engineering. I'm really into new technologies and love coding, assembling computers, and learning new things. In my free time, I love to watch movies, hang out with friends, and take pictures of beautiful places. I'm constantly building up my career and am not afraid of new challenges.

Fernando Vargas

SEO Intern

Hello everyone! My name is Fernando Vargas. I’m 21 years old, I’m from Valle de Santiago, Guanajuato. I’m studying Computer Systems Engineering. I’m motivated to learn new things about SEO and front-end development. I love playing video games and reading sci-fi books. I am inquisitive, and I love teamwork. I hate being left with doubts or not completing activities.

JUSTIA PET NEWS

A Four-Legged Dynamic Duo

Benito (5 years old) is a Chihuahua. He loves to sunbathe and go for walks to greet his friends and neighbors. Burbuja is a mixed-race dog, but she looks like a Cocker Spaniel. She is an old dog, and next year she will celebrate her quinceañera party with her friends and family. Save the date!

- Manu

Upcoming Holidays

Dates to Remember

Constitution Day takes place in Mexico on the first Monday of February, regardless of the date. On this day, people commemorate the anniversary of Mexico’s current constitution, which was promulgated on February 5th, 1917.

REVIEWS & RECOMMENDATIONS

Hot Fuzz (2007)

Available on Place

"No. It’s not that kind of movie! Simon Pegg plays an amazing police officer who gets moved to the quietest village anywhere. As he tries to unwind and live a quiet, normal life, his police instincts constantly act up and make him see crime everywhere. A movie that didn’t make the A-list, and many don’t even know it exists. It has a great cast of notable actors and actresses. If you watch it more than once, you will begin to see more and more foreshadowing and items you missed, making our police officer seem either crazier or more amazing."

- John Pruitt
